definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: Facing the enemies, our soldiers would die rather than surrender.
sentences.chinese: 面對敵人，我們的戰士寧死不屈。

sentences.english: The warrior would as soon die as surrender.
For the protection of ZhongLiang blood, shaolin the monk would die rather than surrender, strive to resist.
sentences.chinese: 爲保護忠良的血脈，少林衆僧寧死不屈，奮力抵抗。

sentences.english: Surrender to the enemy? We will die first .
sentences.chinese: 向敵人投降？我們寧死不屈。

sentences.english: The soldier preferred to die rather than give in.
Liu Hulan would rather die than surrender before the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 劉胡蘭在敵人面前寧死不屈。

sentences.english: He would rather die than surrender under the enemy's cruel torture.
sentences.chinese: 在敵人的酷刑之下，他寧死不屈。

sentences.english: The hero preferred to die rather than surrender.
Facing too, the field of torture, JiDePing silence to die rather than give in.
sentences.chinese: 面對太田的嚴刑拷打，季德平沉默以對寧死不屈。

sentences.english: He said he would die first.
Many people preferred to die rather than surrender during the war.
sentences.chinese: 在戰爭期間，許多人寧死不屈。

definition: anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize
use both carrot and stick/use gentle methods and force/an iron hand in a velvet glove
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
social stratum below the level of ordinary people/untouchable/dalit (India caste)
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
